Posts.EditableText: How do you make the game scroll to the top of a screen? Preferably something I can enter in 'after entering a room'? Thank you in advance.
Posts.HTML: How do you make the game scroll to the top of a screen? Preferably something I can enter in 'after entering a room'? Thank you in advance.

Posts.EditableText:
To scroll to the top:
```
JS.eval("$('html,body').animate({ scrollTop: 0 }, 'fast');")
```
and to the bottom:
```
JS.scrollToEnd()
```

To scroll a particular element to the top of the screen:
```
msg ("<hr class=\"scrollBreak\" />")
JS.eval("$('html,body').animate({ scrollTop: $('.scrollBreak').last().offset()['top'] }, 'fast');")
```
